message.content: {"id": "19089", "title": "No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)", "description": "There is a bug in the Photon version where the popup menu does not appear when right clicking on the left vertical ruler in the Java editor. This menu is supposed to allow users to add breakpoints or marks, but it does not show up.", "OB": "Open a Java editor and right click on the left vertical ruler.", "EB": "The popup menu to add breakpoints or marks does not appear.", "SR": "Investigate and fix the issue to ensure that the popup menu appears when right clicking on the left vertical ruler in the Java editor."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
